title: Materials Program Manager
summary: Apple is a place where extraordinary people gather to do their best work. Join Apple and help leave the world better than we found it. As a Materials Program Manager, you will handle materials critical to the organization's success.
description: CLEAR TO BUILD - Handle the CTB process, ensure smooth logistics flow, deal with excess & obsolete materials, drive new product material readiness, play a role in allocations, and provide executive management reporting.
key_qualifications:
-  “Advanced User” of Excel and a deep understanding of Excel Modeling techniques is a plus. Highly analytical and detail oriented.
-  Show strong written and oral interpersonal skills with the ability to present to Executive teams.
-  Technical expertise and prior OEM materials management experience is a plus
education_experience: BS/BA +3 to 10 years Materials/Production/Planning experience or MBA +2 years experience.
additional_requirements: Apple is an equal opportunity employer committed to inclusion and diversity. They offer opportunities to all applicants, including minorities, women, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities.
